content: choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it if you enjoyed this pattern you may be interested in some of my other patterns you can check them out here 1 you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @elly donner on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me here 2 @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/elly-donner 2 https //www ravelry com/people/stopitharry
